/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades adorned with vibrant signs and advertisements that add a splash of color to the scene. Cars and buses are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the busy traffic typical of city life. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. In the distance, trees can be seen, providing a touch of nature amidst the urban landscape.
